website_summaries.verdict: For comfort that lasts throughout the day, the Puma Match Lo B&W should be your top choice. But comfort is just the tip of the iceberg with these sneakers. They’re well-built with nice patent leather accents on the sides and the heels, have a true-to-size fit, and an obvious quality that belies their incredible price.The only thing stopping these sneakers from being too perfect is their less-than-grippy soles that you won’t want to take out in the rain or during icy conditions.
pros: A whole lot of testers were united in saying that the Puma Match Lo B&W are completely comfortable sneakers that could be worn all day without pain or rubbing in
Most people called the low-top sneakers stylish
More than a few especially loved the little hints of patent leather on the backs and sides of the shoes which they say are “the cherry on top.”
Many purchasers recounted how often they received compliments on their Puma kicks
A significant number of users found the fit of the Puma Match Lo B&W “great.”
Several purchasers stated that the casual footwear was true-to-size
The price of the Puma Match Lo B&W sneakers are “incredible” when you compare it to their value, a good number of reviewers remarked
A customer commended the unique color of the lifestyle footwear as well as the shoes’ durability
cons: Several users complained that the Puma Match Lo B&W shoes do not have any arch support at all

customer_reviews.title: run true to size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are awesome. They look great and are stylish. Based on amazon's suggestions and reviews I read, I ordered a size 8.5 and they ended up being to big on me. I think I need a size 8. I should have known this since I am usually a size 8 shoe in most flats and sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to have more comfortable shoes for weekends but they just aren't very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute style - I received many compliments. I wear flats regularly so I don't usually complain about the lack of arch support, but there was NONE for this shoe. I bought these to have more comfortable shoes for weekends but they just aren't very comfortable. Also, on the second day of wearing, I they showed a lot of wear already and there were small cracks on the side. They are ok for the price, and I am hoping that some inserts will help.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: ELEGANT LOOKING SNEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so simple and elegant looking. I am a size 10.5 with narrow feet. These shoes do appear to be narrow when you first put them on, but i can tell that they are going to stretch out because of the leather. So i would just order your normal size and let them break it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: color is blah
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine: my normal size 9 fits well. Leather is soft and the shoes are fairly comfortable right away. I didn't like the color, though. It's not just off-white-- it has a lot of yellow in it, like old parchment paper-- and looks dingy and outdated. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Europe

customer_reviews.title: arch support is not good. However for the price that I paid
customer_reviews.text: Wear ok, arch support is not good. However for the price that I paid, this is what I sort of expected. I can get an arch support to insert into the shoe. Have only worn them for a few hours without a problem, but I expect the shoes to improve in comfort the longer they are worn. This style of shoe is hard to find so for the money I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size not the same
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this same one in white, the white pair fit perfect, these were to narrow
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers they're everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers they're everything I wanted. Leather they fit great they feel great I'm wearing them all the time. There's nothing negative about these they fit a 9 and I'm a 9 always
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers, patent leather surprise!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were such a good buy! When I opened them up I was pleasantly surprised to see little hints of patent leather on the back and sides of the sneakers. I guess I hadn't noticed that in the photos, but loved that it was there, so it made me love them even more! Got lots of compliments on these sneaks, especially from other sneaker enthusiasts, which is always a good sign. The fit is great, not too narrow, not too wide. And I can wear them all day with socks and I have no pain or rubbing. All in all, I'm VERY pleased!
customer_reviews.author: WorkSlave1010

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 for ONE reason...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pair of shoes! Fits true to size. Very durable and the leather accents on the back is the cherry on top! Easy to clean but the only issue is that I wish the soles would grip to wet and/or icy surfaces just a bit better. I know these aren't snow shoes or rain boots but I've noticed that when it rains the soles can get slippery if you're not careful. Other than that, I'm quite satisfied with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Zoua

customer_reviews.title: they're more of an offwhite/eggshell color which i like.
customer_reviews.text: loves these. i get a lot of compliments for them. they're more of an offwhite/eggshell color which i like.
customer_reviews.author: mash

customer_reviews.title: Not wide width feet friendly
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend for people who have wide flat feet like myself. It fits fine on my right foot but doesn’t fit right on my left foot. Either I have to put some sort of cushion so it won’t cause friction or wear my other shoes. Wish I can return them but I wore them outside. :(
customer_reviews.author: Karissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and wore well considering
customer_reviews.text: Was delayed multiple times during travel and spent almost 5 days in these shoes. Very comfortable and wore well considering.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers seem to be an odd shape especially by the toes. It looks as if they were an irregular pair. Tiny by toes and big an bulky by ankle. I returned the.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cream leather sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Not the best support but good enough. I won't use them for all day wear anyway so they will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: showdog2

customer_reviews.title: Liked that patent leather touches- dresses them up for going ...
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Liked that patent leather touches- dresses them up for going out with jeans
customer_reviews.author: K. Meaney

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these almost as much as the red ones I bought just like these. Comfy and cute.

customer_reviews.title: I love the patent details
customer_reviews.text: I love the patent details! These have taken a little bit of time to break in, but are extremely comfortable. I get many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these! get compliments and they are comfy to wear all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great look with patent leather highlights. The price was incredible too. I may order another pair.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My new Puma's are so nice, can't wait to wear then with my new outfit.

customer_reviews.title: They look really nice. I have narrow feet and they were even ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very narrow I can wear them though. They look really nice. I have narrow feet and they were even a little tight on me.

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for every day use. I personally love the match series.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and cute! Exactly what I was looking for to wear with jeans and skinny jeans.

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. My pinky hurt. No atch support. Very cute though.

customer_reviews.text: Puma just work for me,they fit perfect every time. My foot tends to be medium to narrow however.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair and price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Great pair and price. Puma never fails.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very nice looking but they run too big!

customer_reviews.title: I have a wide foot but in these sneakers the footsteps are comfortable. I like it
customer_reviews.text: I could have taken a size smaller. I am usually a size 9.5 shoe in most flats and sneakers. I think I need a size 9. They are not too narrow.I have a wide foot but in these sneakers the footsteps are comfortable. I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sleek comfortable shoe that goes with just about everything. Can't wait to get a white pair!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fit and Versatile Color and Style! A+++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and love the style!! I've received numerous compliments. It unexpectedly rained the first day I wore them- No Worries, didn't even phase them! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! Delivery was ahead of time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Eautiful comfortable shoe but the sizing feels so off
customer_reviews.text: Eautiful comfortable shoe but the sizing feels so off. I'm a true 9. The 9 was too tight and the 9.5 is. Little looser than I'd like but it's so great and a great deal that I'm gonna wear thicker socks and work it.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Bought these in black and they look more expensive than ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in black and they look more expensive than they cost. They do run a tad narrow and small so if you're in between sizes, size up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this puma, they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Match Lo B and W, Women’s Match Lo B and W
product_meta.description: Taking cues from PUMA iconic 'match' from the 1974 tennis collection, the match basic sport stays true to a simplistic, yet classic approach to a tennis shoe. The extra reinforment that tennis players needs on their shoes is here recreated with two lateral leather overlays. In this version a use of different tones of whites and black give a more classy look to the style.

specifications.Item model number: MATCH LO BLACK AND WHITE WN'S-W
